name: naves-espaciales
description: App maestra que une bakcend y frontend

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm ci && npm run start" "cd frontend && npm ci && npm run start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm ci && npm run devstart" "cd frontend && npm ci && npm run start"
